text: [Dar oƣoz] mardum jak ummat ʙudand [ammo dar amri din ixtilof kardand]; on goh Alloh taolo pajomʙaronro ʙasoratʙaxsu ʙimdihanda ʙarangext va hamroh ʙo onon kitoʙ [-i osmoni]-ro ʙa haq nozil kard, to mijoni mardum dar on ci ixtilof dostand, dovari kunand; va faqat kasone, ki Tavrot] ʙa onon doda suda ʙud – pas az on ki nisonahoi ravsan ʙa onho rasid – ʙa xotiri sitam va hasodate, ki ʙajnason ʙud, dar mavridi on ixtilof kardand; pas, Alloh taolo ʙa farmoni xes kasonero, ki imon ovarda ʙudand, ʙa haqiqate, ki dar on ixtilof dostand, hidojat namud; va Alloh taolo har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad
